item.title: Hobby
item.description: What Girish knew about having sex with a woman came from spending hours studying his grandfather, the old watchmaker, repair old clocks. Around the time that Girish turned 16, he found that the process of mending something broken and allowing something to chime again fascinated him more than even cricket. There was something soothing about his grandfatherâ€™s painstaking ways of repairing watches and clocks. He decided to study how his grandfather repaired time pieces and the study soon turned into a hobby.
